transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji awaz aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji awaz aa rahi hai bataiye hello.
Customer: Aapka naam?

Customer: Hello
Executive: Aap kahan se bol rahe ho sir?
Customer: Tannu Shri ji baat kar rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Main Zaid baat kar raha hun, Hindi Crafty Creation se.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan ji, toh abhi aap hi ho mere account manager kaun hai?

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji jawab aa rahi hai sir. Zaid ji na sir?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji ji. Abhi toh sir main hi hun, main hi dekhungi. Jab aapka service proper live ho jayega toh fir aapko jo premium service ke liye jo aur ek manager hote hain woh bhi assign ho jayega. But abhi tak yeh aapka production team. Abhi mere ko yeh bola gaya tha na mujhe payment kare hue teen char din ho gaye hain. Toh mere ko bola gaya tha ki abhi hand to hand woh jo hoga, jo product update karega woh uski abhi tak ke koi woh call karta hai fir beech mein cut kar deta hai, theek hai? Abhi jab tak payment nahi hui thi toh aap logon ki 10-20 colle jitni aa rahi thi regular.
Executive: Ek second kya bataya call cut kar deta hai?
Customer: Jo aap jo mere ko woh diya hai na woh update karne ke liye profile. Ha ji. Diya hai koi IndiaMART. Toh woh Arjun Arjun karke hai kuch kya naam hai uska? Production team se hoga woh shayad. Haan production team se hai toh woh proper kar nahi pa raha hai matlab baat.
Executive: Aapke matlab coordinate kar raha hai sahi se?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Aapko coordinate kar raha hai woh sahi se?
Customer: Haan nahi karta hai. Woh kaat deta hai fir dobara main karta hun. Matlab sahi se baat nahi kar raha hai woh. Theek hai? Aur mere paas itna time nahi hai ki main baar baar bolunga. Ha.
Customer: Na message ka woh reply kar raha hai. Ki main baar baar usko bolunga ki bhai yeh kaam karo yeh karwao mere ko. Mere ko bola gaya tha ki aaj update kar dega aur is is week ke andar andar update ho jayega aapka. Ha ha woh toh ho jayega. Dusra plan. Theek hai? Toh abhi tak ke jab mere jo product update karwane the mujhe wohi nahi unhone kare toh aage kaise woh kar dega?
Executive: Aap jo call le rahe hain na aapka unka naam mujhe bataiye kya naam bataya aapne Anuj ya Abhishek kya bataya?
Customer: Do minute line pe rahiye main batata hun. Haan.

Customer: Number bataun?

Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir boliye.
Customer: Number bataun number se pehchan loge ki na Arjun Jat karke hai kuch.

Customer: 7840019696 yeh number hai uska.


Executive: Arjun kya pura naam kya hai kuch dikha raha hai?
Customer: Arjun Jat naam show ho raha hai yeh whatsapp par. Theek hai. Aur number kya bataya aapne?
Customer: Number hai inka main 78400 78400 19696 19696 123456
Executive: 7840019696 theek hai?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai inko abhi main mail dalti hun ki aapko aapke jo time hai matlab as soon as possible aapko coordinate karke isko as soon as possible matlab live karne ke liye theek hai? Aur baki aur toh kuch problem nahi ho raha hai na? Bas iske alawa.
Customer: Nahi baki mere ko yeh matlab mujhe properly nahi pata hai product kaise update hota hai toh mere ko woh jaanna tha. Because mere ko bhi karna hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi abhi wahan se already calls aayega wohi log karenge abhi aapko abhi kuch bhi nahi karna hai baki jo cheeze karna hoga website mein hoga. Aur abhi woh aapki aapne kaha ki coordinate sahi nahi ho raha hai toh isliye aapke thoda issue ho gaya hai but abhi main unko call karti hun ya fir main mail bhi dal dungi unko taki matlab aap thoda morning mein free hote hain ki aap sham mein free hote hain because aap bahut zyada busy hote hain toh obviously baat hai aapko yeh teen din se lagatar call kar raha hun main free hokar. But woh utha nahi raha hai toh jaise us cheez ko samajhiye jaise aap pehle call kar rahe the na. Haan ji haan ji. Plan upgrade karwane ke liye toh usi hisab se dobara se woh kariye. Screen show ho raha hai message kisko call unko?
Customer: Haan koi bhi ho jo bhi aapke production team se ho jaise aap. Haan haan main wohi samajh gayi. Nahi sir main abhi yeh jo number diya hai abhi main dekhti hun matlab call aur mail dono karti hun aur turant main unko bata bhi deti hun ki aapke yeh jitne bhi products hai jo bhi update karna hai update bhi karna hai sara cheeze jaldi ho jaye taki is week ke andar live ho jaye. Theek hai? Aur abhi main bolti hun unko aapko call back bhi karne ke liye. And sir abhi yeh jo aapne call bhi kiya hai customer care pe call kiya hai right sir? Toh abhi bhi main account manager hun toh isliye woh calls pehle mere paas bhi aayega. Toh agar aap mujhe yeh whatsapp pe bhi matlab bata dete na matlab ya fir mujhe normal call bhi kar dete mujhe yeh cheez pata nahi thi na abhi bhi aap hi ho. Achcha. Theek hai koi problem nahi hai. Jis din man lijiye change bhi ho jayega main aapko whatsapp pe message bhi drop kar dungi ki aapka manager bhi change ho gaya. Is week ke andar andar ho jayega na update yeh? Haan ji haan ji yeh ho jayega main aapko whatsapp pe message bhi drop kar dungi jab update ho bhi jayega. Abhi kya karna hai kyunki aapne customer care pe call kiya hai toh yahan pe ek complaint kind of raise ho jata hai toh maine already aapke connect bhi kar liya hai and aapko discuss bhi kar liya hai aur abhi main unko bhi call kar lungi toh abhi toh main isko close kar do yeh jo complaint raise hua hai tha?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aapne customer care pe call kiya hai na sir?
Customer: Haan haan. Haan toh aapka jo catalog hai uske through ek complaint show hoga. Aapke catalog mein woh show hoga. Toh isliye woh hota hai ki agar manager se connect nahi hua hai toh woh show hota hai. Already maine aapke connect bhi kar hi liya hai discuss bhi ho chuka hai and aapne mujhe jo number diya hai Anuj jinka number diya hai toh main unse discuss bhi kar lungi toh abhi ke liye toh main jo call kiya hai toh yeh matlab ticket close kar do sir?
Customer: Haan kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai actually toh fir aapke paas na ek matlab aapne call kiya hai na toh feedback bhi aayega woh mere feedback hoga ki maine aapko connect kiya hai ki nahi toh aap please wahan pe na yes dal dijiyega. Theek hai aur main inko abhi connect kar leti hun. Okay. Theek theek hai sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product update not completed.

- Production team member not coordinating properly.

- Wants product update to be completed soon.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive will mail and call concerned team.

- Executive asked to provide feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide updates on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product update, coordination, customer care, feedback
